subject: Re: [junit] How to test using XML and XSLT?
msgSnippet: ... the sandbox module of JUnit-addons has a DOMAssert class that I m working on (when I have the need).  So feel free to download the module and use/extend
messageBody:
> (AssertXPath() would a good extension for junit addons if it's not
> there already)

the sandbox module of JUnit-addons has a DOMAssert class that I'm
working on (when I have the need). So feel free to download the module
and use/extend the class as needed.

-Vladimir
